# Example 3.16 (Coin Tossing) 

Prove that at least two people in Atlanta, Georgia, have the same initials, assuming no one has more than four initials.



```{r}

factorial(26) / (factorial(4) * factorial(26-4))
	
```





```{r}
26 + 325 + 2600 + 14950


```
